short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analytical features for your grades that would skyrocket your school performance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This comprehensive tool helps students stay informed about their academic performance, set realistic goals, and manage their study efforts effectively.

**RELOAD CANVAS AFTER INSTALLING

**CHECK A COURSE'S GRADE PAGE TO SEE THIS! üòä

**IF THIS IS NOT WORKING O AND YOUR CANVAS DOMAIN NAME IS LIKE canvas.[institution name].edu SEND ME AN EMAIL

**Data is only stored through Local Storage. This chrome extension is serverless and doesn't have a third party database outside chrome. If you delete this extension, the data will be cleared and cannot be restored.

Features ‚ú®

1. Grade Tracker: This graph monitors your grade by recording changes when you visit the course grade page. It updates if it is a different day and your grade changed. It also lets you know how much your grade went up or down from the last time you checked (need at least 2 saved grades).

2. Quartile Grade Calculation: This calculates the course grade based on quartiles (upper quartile, median, and lower quartile). For example, the upper quartile considers the upper quartile scores across all assignments and calculates the grade as if a student achieved the upper quartile on every assignment

3. Assignment Overview: This feature categorizes assignments based on grade percentage and weight category. It provides an organized view of your assignments with a donut chart.

‚ÄìIMPROVEMENTS AND MORE TO COME! CONTACT THE DEVELOPER THROUGH THIS EXTENSION‚ÄôS POPUP, THE WEBSITE OR DIRECTLY THROUGH THE EXTENSION WEB STORE IF YOU ENCOUNTER A BUG OR HAVE A SUGGESTION üòé--
